Sys Class Reference
System Settings

System Settings (brightness, version, units) More...

#include <Sys.hpp>

Inherits HioControl.

Detailed Description

This allows applications to access system settings.

#include <fogo/Light.hpp>
#include <fogo/Sys.hpp>
//Set the light to high brightness
Light::set_brightness( Sys::brightness_high() );
